source.a639c95c:
#@title Download Kaggle dataset in Google Colab {display-mode: "form"}

#@markdown You must upload `kaggle.json` file.

#!kaggle datasets download -h

KAGGLE_PATH = '/content/drive/MyDrive/Datasets'#@param {type:"string"}
KAGGLE_DATASET_API_COMMEND =  "kaggle datasets download -d BengaliAI/numta" #@param {type:"string"}

KAGGLE_DATASET_API_COMMEND += f" -p {KAGGLE_PATH}"

!pip install -U -q kaggle
!mkdir -p $KAGGLE_PATH
!mkdir ~/.kaggle

# file upload using google.colab 
print("Please Upload `kaggle.json` file")
from google.colab import files 
files.upload()


! cp kaggle.json ~/.kaggle
! chmod 600 ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json

! cp kaggle.json $KAGGLE_PATH
! chmod 600 $KAGGLE_PATH/kaggle.json

!rm -f kaggle.json

!$KAGGLE_DATASET_API_COMMEND

# Download Kaggle dataset in Google Colab - @rafat97


## How Can I get API Commend 
![image.png](attachment:image.png)


## Some important parameter 

`KAGGLE_PATH` Where are store data path 

`KAGGLE_DATASET_API_COMMEND` API Commend from kaggle dataset 


## Important note

* Must upload `kaggle.json`
